The Ministry of Culture and Fine Arts (MCFA; , UNGEGN: ) is the government ministry of Cambodia with a mandate to promote and preserve Cambodian culture.
See also
* Culture of Cambodia
* Government of Cambodia
External links
*[http://www.mcfa.gov.kh/ Ministry of Fine Arts]
